creator: belial
description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Sirian{x

Sirian is the God of Chaos. Sirian is crazy. His plans and schemes make
little sense most of the time, but usually create a lot of havoc and
destruction. He thrives on unpredictability and insanity. Noone is sure what
his final goal is, but most think it is to destroy the world. He is despised
by Aludra, Nephium, and Caerdik, so he returns the sentiment. His followers
seem to be a mass of lunatics, noone is sure if there is a heirarchy within
his sect or if it's just a bunch or destructive crazies running around like
chickens with their heads cut off. Sirian's followers gain many destructive
spells, making them even more dangerous than they would be without.
